description_for_human: Evaluate and improve oral presentations with AI-powered feedback, transcription, and multi-criteria scoring. 100% local processing for maximum privacy.
description_for_model: AI Speech Evaluator is an educational tool that helps users improve their oral presentations through AI-powered evaluation. It uses RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) technology to compare speech transcriptions against reference documents and provides detailed, multi-criteria feedback. Key capabilities: (1) Upload reference documents (PDF, DOCX, TXT), (2) Record or upload audio presentations, (3) Automatic transcription using local Whisper model, (4) Evaluate based on 5 criteria: accuracy (faithfulness to document), clarity (comprehensibility), completeness (topic coverage), coherence (logical flow), and fluency (naturalness), (5) Generate actionable improvement suggestions. All processing is 100% local - no cloud services required. Target users: students preparing for oral exams, professionals improving presentation skills, educators assessing speeches. Privacy-first design with zero data sharing.
